sentences.english: The missing sailors are two men aged 30 and 52.
sentences.chinese: 失踪的两名船员为30岁和52岁男子。

sentences.english: The unidentified armed group used guns to force the Chinese crew to increase speed sailing towards Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 不明武装用枪逼着中国船员加足马力向泰国驶去。

sentences.english: An international radiotelephone signal word used by aircraft and ships in distress.
sentences.chinese: 遇险后，船员立刻发出求救信号。

sentences.english: How are lost crew numbers replenished post-battle?
sentences.chinese: 在海战结束后如何补充船员数量？

sentences.english: All crew members assembled on boat deck and exercised abandon ship drill.
sentences.chinese: 全体船员在艇甲板上集合，进行弃船演习。

sentences.english: The lifeboat brought off all the crew.
sentences.chinese: 救生船把船上所有船员都救了出来。

sentences.english: As soon as the alarm went, the crew raced around shutting the watertight doors.
sentences.chinese: 警报一响，船员们跑来跑去把船上的水密门关紧。

sentences.english: All the crew must submit to the shipmaster's aforementioned decisions unconditionally.
sentences.chinese: 所有船员必须无条件地服从船长做出的上述决定。

sentences.english: Over 4,000 men who had sailed aboard Yamato and its escorts were dead.
sentences.chinese: 大和号及其护航舰上超过4000名船员阵亡。

sentences.english: She was carrying 1316 passengers and a crew of 891.
sentences.chinese: 其时船上搭载着1316名乘客和891名船员。

sentences.english: Forty-six South Korean sailors died in the March 26 incident.
sentences.chinese: 在3月26日的事件中，有46名韩国船员遇难。

sentences.english: The crew has also become accustomed to Alinghi’s speed.
sentences.chinese: 船员也适应了阿林吉号的速度。

sentences.english: Sound the ship's general alarm to rouse all crew.
sentences.chinese: 发全船紧急警报唤醒船员。

sentences.english: The crew found safety at the bow of the boat.
sentences.chinese: 船员们都到船头安全的地方躲了起来。

sentences.english: The weakened and hungry captain and crew of The Unthank did not resist;
sentences.chinese: 虚弱并且饥饿的船长和船员没有反对。

sentences.english: Later, the two hunters schemed to capture the stranded crew of 90 Rebels.
sentences.chinese: 随后，二人策划俘获落难的90名起义军船员。
